item.title: FAT Brands Lenders Want CEO Suspended Over Twin Peaks Stock Sale
item.description: Lenders to bankrupt restaurant operator FAT Brands Inc. want the chief executive officer suspended without pay over a recent stock sale for its Twin Peaks dining chain, deepening a battle for control of the company as it attempts to restructure.

item.title: Dow Jones Industrial Average Rises Past 50,000 For First Time
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average broke above the 50,000 level for the first time, as investors bid up the blue-chip gauge amid optimism over the US economy and corporate earnings.

item.title: Lots More With Charlie McElligott on This Week's SaaSpocalypse
item.description: A terrible few days for software, crypto, and more.

item.title: Apple Plans to Allow Outside Voice-Controlled AI Chatbots in CarPlay
item.description: Apple Inc. is preparing to allow voice-controlled artificial intelligence apps from other companies in CarPlay, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that will let users query AI chatbots through its vehicle interface for the first time.

item.title: Lots More With Charlie McElligott on the SaaSpocalypse (Podcast)
item.description: This week has been a pretty wild one in markets. Some of the most popular trades of recent years — like going long software, crypto, or gold — suddenly collapsed. Of course, there are plenty of things you can point to as the proximate cause of the selloff. AI is now an existential threat to SaaS. Bitcoin has seen some unflattering headlines. The nomination of Kevin Warsh as the next Federal Reserve chair stalled the debasement trade. But the way the market functions has also changed enormously,

item.title: Ex-Goldman Sachs Star Banker Leissner Goes to Prison in 1MDB Fraud
item.description: Former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. banker Tim Leissner reported to federal prison to begin serving a two-year sentence for one of the largest financial frauds in history.

item.title: Chicago Transit Deal Attracts Investor Cash Flooding Muni Market
item.description: The second-largest transit system in the US is benefiting from municipal bond investors looking to put billions of dollars to work.

item.title: Bessent Rebuts Split Between His and Trump’s Dollar Comments
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent rebutted the idea that he and Donald Trump have presented different takes on the dollar, after the president had embraced the currency’s recent drop while Bessent had touted a “strong dollar policy.”

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称人工智能资本支出合理且可持续
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋面对客户在数据中心过度支出的担忧时表示，当前的支出水平是合理且可持续的。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang, facing concerns that customers are overspending on data centers, said that the level of expenditures is appropriate and sustainable.】

item.title: 英伟达股价飙升，因科技巨头宣布6500亿美元人工智能支出计划
item.description: 英伟达公司股价周五飙升，投资者争相买入那些有望受益于科技巨头今年在人工智能基础设施领域巨额投资的公司股票。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shares soared Friday as investors snapped up shares of companies positioned to benefit from the vast sum of money that big technology firms have said they’ll spend on artificial intelligence infrastructure this year.】

item.title: 为何游戏股AI恐慌毫无道理
item.description: Video-game stocks inexplicably plummeted after Google revealed Genie, a tool for building virtual worlds

item.title: 詹妮弗·加纳创投公司Once Upon a Farm在1.98亿美元IPO后股价上涨17%
item.description: 由女演员詹妮弗·加纳联合创立的有机儿童零食制造商"童话农场"公司，在周五上市首日股价飙升17%，此前该公司及其部分投资者通过首次公开募股筹集了1.979亿美元。【原文：Once Upon a Farm PBC, the organic kids snacks maker co-founded by actress Jennifer Garner, jumped 17% in its trading debut Friday, after the company and some of its investors raised $197.9 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: EQT生命科学基金支持的AgomAb公司IPO募资2亿美元后股价暴跌8%
item.description: 由EQT生命科学基金支持的临床阶段生物制药公司AgomAb Therapeutics NV周五上市首日开盘价较发行价下跌8.1%，此前该公司通过上市融资2亿美元。【原文：AgomAb Therapeutics NV, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company backed by EQT Life Sciences, opened 8.1% below its IPO price on Friday after the firm raised $200 million in a listing.】

item.title: 债券交易员静候大数据周催化剂引爆收益率波动
item.description: 在规模达30万亿美元的国债市场，本周小幅上涨的行情正为投资者铺路，即将发布的三项经济数据或将为市场进一步消化美联储未来数月降息的预期提供依据。【原文：A week of modest gains in the $30 trillion Treasury market is setting investors up for a trio of upcoming economic releases that stand to offer further reason to price in a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut in the coming months.】

item.title: H&F Said In Talks for Buyout of Payments Firm Bill Holdings
item.description: Hellman & Friedman has been in talks to acquire business payments firm Bill Holdings Inc., people familiar with the matter said, in what would be another sizable buyout of a financial software company.

item.title: 眼科护理公司SpyGlass Pharma在1.5亿美元IPO后股价飙升50%
item.description: SpyGlass Pharma Inc.在首次公开募股中筹集1.5亿美元后，这家生物制药公司在交易首日股价飙升50%。【原文：SpyGlass Pharma Inc. shares jumped 50% in the biopharmaceutical firm’s trading debut after it raised $150 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 贝莱德的里德抛售美国信用债，转投新兴市场
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.）的里克·里德（Rick Rieder）表示，他正在减少对美国投资级债券和高收益债券的配置，同时增加新兴市场债务的持有量，理由是估值具有吸引力且美元走软。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s Rick Rieder said he’s reducing exposure to US investment-grade and high-yield bonds while increasing holdings of emerging-market debt, citing favorable valuations and a soft dollar.】

item.title: 罗恩·巴伦巨额持有SpaceX ETF规避SEC流动性不足资产限制
item.description: 罗恩·巴伦——这位长期投资埃隆·马斯克的新晋交易所交易基金（ETF）玩家——已然在颠覆这个14万亿美元行业的常规。【原文：Ron Baron — a longtime Elon Musk investor and a newcomer to the exchange-traded fund universe — is already subverting norms in the $14 trillion industry.】

item.title: 美元或终结三周跌势，因金价涨势止步，日元走低
item.description: 美元正朝着自1月初以来的首次周涨幅迈进，因更广泛金融市场的动荡促使投资者涌向避险资产，交易员们也平仓了此前押注美元下跌的头寸——这些头寸在美元暴跌时曾带来可观收益。【原文：The dollar is headed toward its first weekly gain since early January as turmoil in broader financial markets drove investors into havens and traders unwound bets against the currency that paid off when it tumbled.】

item.title: 英伟达重返中国市场，此举为何充满风险
item.description: 英伟达公司创始人黄仁勋历经数月游说，终于如愿以偿——美国政府批准该公司向中国出售其主力人工智能芯片。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s Jensen Huang finally got what he spent months lobbying for when the US government authorized the company to sell its workhorse artificial intelligence chip to China.】

item.title: 魁北克企业竭力留住外籍员工 应对严打行动
item.description: 从工厂车间到市政厅，越来越多的声音发出警告：在法语区魁北克省终止一项移民计划，可能导致众多工人离开加拿大，使雇主们陷入招聘困境。【原文：From factory floors to city halls, a growing chorus is warning that the end of an immigration program in French-speaking Quebec may push many workers out of the country and leave employers struggling to fill jobs.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊称生产率增长有助于抑制通胀
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普·杰斐逊表示，他对美国经济前景持"谨慎乐观"态度，并指出强劲的生产率增长有望助力通胀回归央行设定的2%目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson said he was “cautiously optimistic” about the outlook for the US economy, suggesting strong productivity growth could help return inflation to the central bank’s 2% target.】

item.title: 坎托收购案将缩减奥康纳在亚洲和欧洲的业务版图
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在从瑞银集团收购对冲基金后，坎托菲茨杰拉德公司正大幅削减奥康纳在美国以外地区的业务。【原文：Cantor Fitzgerald LP is shedding much of O’Connor’s presence outside of the US following its acquisition of the hedge fund from UBS Group AG, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 芝加哥期权交易所将推出二元事件投注，推动预测市场发展
item.description: 交易所运营商芝商所全球市场公司计划推出期权合约，允许对事件结果进行二元押注，以此进军快速增长的预测市场。【原文：Exchange operator Cboe Global Markets Inc. plans to roll out options contracts that will enable binary bets on event outcomes, in a bid to enter the fast-growing prediction markets.】

item.title: 据称北欧资本正考虑以20亿欧元出售Conscia公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，北欧资本正考虑出售丹麦网络安全公司Conscia，并寻求超过20亿欧元（约合24亿美元）的估值。【原文：Nordic Capital is considering a sale of Danish cybersecurity firm Conscia and seeking a valuation of more than €2 billion ($2.4 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: PJM预测未来十年电力供应将出现重大短缺，数据中心热潮持续升温
item.description: 美国最大电网运营商PJM互联公司警告称，随着数据中心加速需求增长，未来十年电力供应缺口可能高达60吉瓦。【原文：PJM Interconnection LLC, operator of the largest US grid, warned of a potential power supply shortfall of as much as 60 gigawatts over the next decade as data centers accelerate demand growth.】

item.title: 体育应用Sleeper将与Kalshi合作推出预测市场
item.description: 曾起诉美国衍生品监管机构的幻想体育应用将与Kalshi公司合作，在其平台上提供投注服务，成为蓬勃发展的预测市场行业最新入局者。【原文：A fantasy sports app that once sued the US derivatives regulator will partner with Kalshi Inc. to offer wagers on its platform, the latest entrant into the surging prediction markets industry.】

item.title: 对冲基金遭遇数月来最惨重单日跌幅，人工智能驱动的轮动效应加剧市场震荡
item.description: 本周因担忧人工智能影响而引发的股市动荡，已动摇了众多对冲基金策略——这些策略在2026年伊始曾表现强劲。【原文：The turmoil unleashed in stocks this week by worries about the impact of artificial intelligence has rattled a slew of hedge fund strategies that had been enjoying a strong start to 2026.】

item.title: Waymo称Genie 3模拟技术可助力自动驾驶出租车推广
item.description: Alphabet旗下Waymo公司表示，正利用DeepMind的Genie 3人工智能模型构建逼真的数字世界，为其自动驾驶技术提供边缘案例场景训练环境。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo said it is using DeepMind’s Genie 3 AI model to create realistic, digital worlds for its autonomous driving technology to train on edge-case scenarios.】

item.title: 全球糖业供过于求，且过剩局面将持续
item.description: 全球供应过剩令糖市承压，而最大产糖国巴西即将迎来大丰收，这意味着该问题很可能持续存在。【原文：The sugar market is weighed down by a global glut, and a big crop coming from top grower Brazil means the problem is likely to persist.】
